column5: How would you like to stay in a creative space ? An Eco-friendly atmosphere 30 miles west of Houston, Texas. Slightly off the main hwy. Providing all the essential that meets hospitality recommendation.   Relaxing, tranquil, nature friendly, great place for green thinkers. If you need transportation to and from the airport let us know. Very warm space for couples, solo adventurers, and families (with kids). Additional add ons are available for groups.
column8: Eco Friendly Country Lifestyle, Scenic, Privacy.
